HTTP POST/PUT/PATCH requests

HTTP POST/PUT/PATCH requests

Examples

(x <- HttpClient$new(url = "https://httpbin.org"))
#> <crul connection> 
#>   url: https://httpbin.org
#>   curl options: 
#>   proxies: 
#>   auth: 
#>   headers: 

# POST requests
## a list
(res_post <- x$post('post', body = list(hello = "world"), verbose = TRUE))
#> <crul response> 
#>   url: https://httpbin.org/post
#>   request_headers: 
#>     User-Agent: libcurl/7.51.0 r-curl/2.6 crul/0.3.5.9110
#>     Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate
#>   response_headers: 
#>     status: HTTP/1.1 200 OK
#>     connection: keep-alive
#>     server: meinheld/0.6.1
#>     date: Mon, 15 May 2017 18:12:03 GMT
#>     content-type: application/json
#>     access-control-allow-origin: *
#>     access-control-allow-credentials: true
#>     x-powered-by: Flask
#>     x-processed-time: 0.00113296508789
#>     content-length: 531
#>     via: 1.1 vegur
#>   status: 200

## a string
(res_post <- x$post('post', body = "hello world", verbose = TRUE))
#> <crul response> 
#>   url: https://httpbin.org/post
#>   request_headers: 
#>     User-Agent: libcurl/7.51.0 r-curl/2.6 crul/0.3.5.9110
#>     Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate
#>   response_headers: 
#>     status: HTTP/1.1 200 OK
#>     connection: keep-alive
#>     server: meinheld/0.6.1
#>     date: Mon, 15 May 2017 18:12:03 GMT
#>     content-type: application/json
#>     access-control-allow-origin: *
#>     access-control-allow-credentials: true
#>     x-powered-by: Flask
#>     x-processed-time: 0.000818967819214
#>     content-length: 463
#>     via: 1.1 vegur
#>   status: 200

## empty body request
x$post('post')
#> <crul response> 
#>   url: https://httpbin.org/post
#>   request_headers: 
#>     User-Agent: libcurl/7.51.0 r-curl/2.6 crul/0.3.5.9110
#>     Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate
#>   response_headers: 
#>     status: HTTP/1.1 200 OK
#>     connection: keep-alive
#>     server: meinheld/0.6.1
#>     date: Mon, 15 May 2017 18:12:04 GMT
#>     content-type: application/json
#>     access-control-allow-origin: *
#>     access-control-allow-credentials: true
#>     x-powered-by: Flask
#>     x-processed-time: 0.00112104415894
#>     content-length: 437
#>     via: 1.1 vegur
#>   status: 200

## form requests
not_run({
  (cli <- HttpClient$new(
    url = "http://apps.kew.org/wcsp/advsearch.do"
  ))
  cli$post(
    encode = "form",
    body = list(
      page = 'advancedSearch',
      genus = 'Gagea',
      species = 'pratensis',
      selectedLevel = 'cont'
    )
  )
})

(x <- HttpClient$new(url = "https://httpbin.org"))
#> <crul connection> 
#>   url: https://httpbin.org
#>   curl options: 
#>   proxies: 
#>   auth: 
#>   headers: 
res <- x$post("post",
  encode = "json",
  body = list(
    genus = 'Gagea',
    species = 'pratensis'
  )
)
jsonlite::fromJSON(res$parse())
#> No encoding supplied: defaulting to UTF-8.
#> $args
#> named list()
#> 
#> $data
#> [1] "{\"genus\":\"Gagea\",\"species\":\"pratensis\"}"
#> 
#> $files
#> named list()
#> 
#> $form
#> named list()
#> 
#> $headers
#> $headers$Accept
#> [1] "*/*"
#> 
#> $headers$`Accept-Encoding`
#> [1] "gzip, deflate"
#> 
#> $headers$Connection
#> [1] "close"
#> 
#> $headers$`Content-Length`
#> [1] "39"
#> 
#> $headers$`Content-Type`
#> [1] "application/json"
#> 
#> $headers$Host
#> [1] "httpbin.org"
#> 
#> $headers$`User-Agent`
#> [1] "libcurl/7.51.0 r-curl/2.6 crul/0.3.5.9110"
#> 
#> 
#> $json
#> $json$genus
#> [1] "Gagea"
#> 
#> $json$species
#> [1] "pratensis"
#> 
#> 
#> $origin
#> [1] "157.130.179.86"
#> 
#> $url
#> [1] "https://httpbin.org/post"
#> 

# PUT requests
(x <- HttpClient$new(url = "https://httpbin.org"))
#> <crul connection> 
#>   url: https://httpbin.org
#>   curl options: 
#>   proxies: 
#>   auth: 
#>   headers: 
(res <- x$put(path = "put",
  encode = "json",
  body = list(
    genus = 'Gagea',
    species = 'pratensis'
  )
))
#> <crul response> 
#>   url: https://httpbin.org/put
#>   request_headers: 
#>     Content-Type: application/json
#>     User-Agent: libcurl/7.51.0 r-curl/2.6 crul/0.3.5.9110
#>     Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate
#>   response_headers: 
#>     status: HTTP/1.1 200 OK
#>     connection: keep-alive
#>     server: meinheld/0.6.1
#>     date: Mon, 15 May 2017 18:12:04 GMT
#>     content-type: application/json
#>     access-control-allow-origin: *
#>     access-control-allow-credentials: true
#>     x-powered-by: Flask
#>     x-processed-time: 0.00244688987732
#>     content-length: 518
#>     via: 1.1 vegur
#>   status: 200
jsonlite::fromJSON(res$parse("UTF-8"))
#> $args
#> named list()
#> 
#> $data
#> [1] "{\"genus\":\"Gagea\",\"species\":\"pratensis\"}"
#> 
#> $files
#> named list()
#> 
#> $form
#> named list()
#> 
#> $headers
#> $headers$Accept
#> [1] "*/*"
#> 
#> $headers$`Accept-Encoding`
#> [1] "gzip, deflate"
#> 
#> $headers$Connection
#> [1] "close"
#> 
#> $headers$`Content-Length`
#> [1] "39"
#> 
#> $headers$`Content-Type`
#> [1] "application/json"
#> 
#> $headers$Host
#> [1] "httpbin.org"
#> 
#> $headers$`User-Agent`
#> [1] "libcurl/7.51.0 r-curl/2.6 crul/0.3.5.9110"
#> 
#> 
#> $json
#> $json$genus
#> [1] "Gagea"
#> 
#> $json$species
#> [1] "pratensis"
#> 
#> 
#> $origin
#> [1] "157.130.179.86"
#> 
#> $url
#> [1] "https://httpbin.org/put"
#> 

res <- x$put("put", body = "foo bar")
jsonlite::fromJSON(res$parse("UTF-8"))
#> $args
#> named list()
#> 
#> $data
#> [1] ""
#> 
#> $files
#> named list()
#> 
#> $form
#> $form$`foo bar`
#> [1] ""
#> 
#> 
#> $headers
#> $headers$Accept
#> [1] "*/*"
#> 
#> $headers$`Accept-Encoding`
#> [1] "gzip, deflate"
#> 
#> $headers$Connection
#> [1] "close"
#> 
#> $headers$`Content-Length`
#> [1] "7"
#> 
#> $headers$`Content-Type`
#> [1] "application/x-www-form-urlencoded"
#> 
#> $headers$Host
#> [1] "httpbin.org"
#> 
#> $headers$`User-Agent`
#> [1] "libcurl/7.51.0 r-curl/2.6 crul/0.3.5.9110"
#> 
#> 
#> $json
#> NULL
#> 
#> $origin
#> [1] "157.130.179.86"
#> 
#> $url
#> [1] "https://httpbin.org/put"
#> 


# PATCH requests
(x <- HttpClient$new(url = "https://httpbin.org"))
#> <crul connection> 
#>   url: https://httpbin.org
#>   curl options: 
#>   proxies: 
#>   auth: 
#>   headers: 
(res <- x$patch(path = "patch",
  encode = "json",
  body = list(
    genus = 'Gagea',
    species = 'pratensis'
  )
))
#> <crul response> 
#>   url: https://httpbin.org/patch
#>   request_headers: 
#>     Content-Type: application/json
#>     User-Agent: libcurl/7.51.0 r-curl/2.6 crul/0.3.5.9110
#>     Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate
#>   response_headers: 
#>     status: HTTP/1.1 200 OK
#>     connection: keep-alive
#>     server: meinheld/0.6.1
#>     date: Mon, 15 May 2017 18:12:04 GMT
#>     content-type: application/json
#>     access-control-allow-origin: *
#>     access-control-allow-credentials: true
#>     x-powered-by: Flask
#>     x-processed-time: 0.000833034515381
#>     content-length: 520
#>     via: 1.1 vegur
#>   status: 200
jsonlite::fromJSON(res$parse("UTF-8"))
#> $args
#> named list()
#> 
#> $data
#> [1] "{\"genus\":\"Gagea\",\"species\":\"pratensis\"}"
#> 
#> $files
#> named list()
#> 
#> $form
#> named list()
#> 
#> $headers
#> $headers$Accept
#> [1] "*/*"
#> 
#> $headers$`Accept-Encoding`
#> [1] "gzip, deflate"
#> 
#> $headers$Connection
#> [1] "close"
#> 
#> $headers$`Content-Length`
#> [1] "39"
#> 
#> $headers$`Content-Type`
#> [1] "application/json"
#> 
#> $headers$Host
#> [1] "httpbin.org"
#> 
#> $headers$`User-Agent`
#> [1] "libcurl/7.51.0 r-curl/2.6 crul/0.3.5.9110"
#> 
#> 
#> $json
#> $json$genus
#> [1] "Gagea"
#> 
#> $json$species
#> [1] "pratensis"
#> 
#> 
#> $origin
#> [1] "157.130.179.86"
#> 
#> $url
#> [1] "https://httpbin.org/patch"
#> 

res <- x$patch("patch", body = "foo bar")
jsonlite::fromJSON(res$parse("UTF-8"))
#> $args
#> named list()
#> 
#> $data
#> [1] ""
#> 
#> $files
#> named list()
#> 
#> $form
#> $form$`foo bar`
#> [1] ""
#> 
#> 
#> $headers
#> $headers$Accept
#> [1] "*/*"
#> 
#> $headers$`Accept-Encoding`
#> [1] "gzip, deflate"
#> 
#> $headers$Connection
#> [1] "close"
#> 
#> $headers$`Content-Length`
#> [1] "7"
#> 
#> $headers$`Content-Type`
#> [1] "application/x-www-form-urlencoded"
#> 
#> $headers$Host
#> [1] "httpbin.org"
#> 
#> $headers$`User-Agent`
#> [1] "libcurl/7.51.0 r-curl/2.6 crul/0.3.5.9110"
#> 
#> 
#> $json
#> NULL
#> 
#> $origin
#> [1] "157.130.179.86"
#> 
#> $url
#> [1] "https://httpbin.org/patch"
#>
